product_name: Seattle Sports SUP SoulMite Paddleboard Cart
long_description: The Seattle Sports SUP SoulMite Paddleboard Cart transports your stand up paddleboard to the water with a suction-cup mount and a design that breaks down so you can take it with you during the paddle. Lash your stand up paddleboard down with the included strap, attach the suction cup handle, and you're ready to roll. Padded roller protects your board, and cart breaks down into wheels and 2 pieces so you can store it on you deck when you're ready to paddle. 35mm, heavy-duty anodized aluminum frame and sturdy air-filled tires offer high durability. Please note: to prevent corrosion around saltwater, rinse and dry Seattle Sports SUP SoulMite after use.
short_description: The Seattle Sports SUP SoulMite Paddleboard Cart transports your stand up paddleboard to the water with a suction-cup mount and a design that breaks down so you can take it with you during the paddle.
